item.title: This blog has a .onion address
item.author: contact@enconn.fr (Sébastien Blin)
item.description: This blog is also available via the Tor Browser. And have a .onion address.onion You can support the Tor project there: https://support.torproject.org/ Or run your own hidden service via https://2019.www.torproject.org/docs/tor-onion-service.html.en
